name: Floor is Lava! (itch)
description:
This game was made in 5 days in the LMOB beginner game jam #28. The theme of the game jam was arcade. This is my 2nd game jam ever and 1st one on this account.

Objective: Move the green guy away from the lava tiles and collect water to increase your score. The game ends once the green guy touches a lava tile.

I hope you enjoy playing it and any feedback is appreciated.

Credits

I made everything by myself (art, sound, music, programming, design).

Game engine: Unity

Art software: Pixel Studio

Sound/music software: BeepBox
